translation.en: I guess it's probably because
I've got a big lesbian crush on you.
translation.ja: レズビアンの 愛の裏返しだと思う

translation.en: Suck on that!
[girls chanting] Janis! Janis! Janis! Janis!
translation.ja: ジャニス　ジャニス！

translation.en: Regina, wait! I didn't mean for that to happen.
translation.ja: こんな結果に なるとは

translation.en: To find out that everyone hates me? I don't care.
translation.ja: 嫌われるのなんか平気

translation.en: Regina, please! Regina, stop!
translation.ja: ねえ 待って レジーナ

translation.en: No! Do you know what everyone says about you?
translation.ja: 自分は何て言われてると？

translation.en: They say that you're a home-schooled jungle freak, who's a less-hot version of me.
translation.ja: “しょせんジャングル娘 レジーナには かなわない”よ

translation.en: Yeah. So don't try to act so innocent.
You can take that fake apology and shove it right up your hairy--
translation.ja: 口先だけの謝罪なんて さっさとドブにでも…

translation.en: [Cady] And that's how Regina George died.
No, I'm totally kidding. But she did get hurt.
translation.ja: それは冗談 でもケガはした

translation.en: Some girls say they saw her head go all the way around. But that's just a rumor.
translation.ja: “首が飛んだ”というのは ただのデマ

translation.en: Some people swear they saw me push her in front of the bus. That was an even worse rumor.
translation.ja: “私が押した”というのは もっと悪質なデマ

translation.en: Everybody done?
No. Mom, I didn't do it.
I don't know what to believe anymore.
Mom, believe me. I'm your daughter.
Why are my tribal vases under the sink?
translation.ja: なぜツボが ここに？

translation.en: -Huh? -My tribal vases. Why were they under the sink?
translation.ja: 部族のツボよ なぜ流し台の下に？

translation.en: I don't know.
This is the fertility vase of the Ndebele tribe. Does that mean anything to you?
translation.ja: 豊作を祈る部族のツボに 興味が？

translation.en: No.
Who are you?
Great. All my friends hate me, and now my mom hates me.
translation.ja: 友達に嫌われたうえに ママにまで

translation.en: Your mom does not hate you.
She's afraid of you.
I don't know, maybe we mainstream-schooled you too soon.
translation.ja: 学校に行かせたのは 早すぎたかも

translation.en: Maybe you should come back and be home-schooled again for a while.
translation.ja: しばらく自宅学習に戻すか

translation.en: [sighs] No. Only thing worse than going back will be not going back.
translation.ja: 今 逃げたら もっと事態は悪くなる

translation.en: How bad's it gonna be tomorrow?
Remember when we saw those lions fighting over the wart hog carcass?
translation.ja: イノシシの死体に群がる ライオンを？

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -I'll be the wart hog.
You're not a wart hog, you're a lion.
translation.ja: 違う　お前はライオンだ

translation.en: Just focus on your studies for a little while.
You're still an excellent student, right?
Oh, yeah. I need you to sign my calculus test.
translation.ja: それが… 数学のテストに サインして

translation.en: Why?
I'm failing.
Okay. You are...
What do they call it? Grounded.
You're grounded.
[girl 1] She pushed her in front of the bus.
[girl 2] Did you see her do it?
Did your teacher ever try to sell you marijuana or Ecstasy tablets?
translation.ja: ノーベリー先生に 麻薬を買わされたことは？

translation.en: [boy 2] What are marijuana tablets?
What's going on? Where's Ms. Norbury?
Mr. Duvall, this is ridiculous. Ms. Norbury does not sell drugs.
translation.ja: 先生は麻薬の売人なんかじゃ ありません

translation.en: I know, Aaron.
But after the allegations against Coach Carr turned out to be extremely true,
translation.ja: だがカー･コーチの 疑惑が事実だったため―

translation.en: the school board felt that it was best that we investigate every claim made in this, uh, Burn Book.
translation.ja: ノート内容を すべて 調査することになった

translation.en: That book was written by a bunch of stupid girls
translation.ja: あれは頭の軽い女どもが 書いた―

translation.en: who make up rumors because they're bored with their own lame lives.
translation.ja: 退屈しのぎのデマです

translation.en: Well, unless someone wants to come forward and say, "I made it all up," this is how we have to handle it.
translation.ja: 誰が書いたか分からない以上 こうするしかない

translation.en: [Cady] Oh, no. Bye, Aaron. You're gonna hate me forever.
translation.ja: さよなら　アーロン 私は永遠に嫌われる

translation.en: Mr. Duvall. I wrote it.
translation.ja: 校長先生　私が書きました

translation.en: [Cady] When you get bit by a snake, you're supposed to suck the poison out.
translation.ja: ヘビにかまれたら 毒を抜くしかない

translation.en: That's what I had to do, suck all the poison out of my life.
translation.ja: 私も自分の毒を全部抜こう

translation.en: I started with Regina, who was living proof
translation.ja: まずレジーナから 恐れられてる人物ほど 花を贈られる

translation.en: that the more people are scared of you, the more flowers you get.
translation.ja: 恐れられてる人物ほど 花を贈られる

translation.en: Then there was Ms. Norbury, who was living proof that no good deed goes unpunished.
translation.ja: ノーベリー先生は 私の罪を責めなかった

translation.en: Oh, hi. Did you wanna buy some drugs?
I'm just done with my quiz.
Wait. I'll grade it right now.
I gotta say, watching the police search my house
really was the cherry on top of a fantastic year.
translation.ja: 今年を飾るに ふさわしい 最高の出来事

translation.en: How much trouble did you get in for telling the truth?
A lot.
You didn't write that whole book yourself. Did you tell Mr. Duvall who else did it?
translation.ja: 一緒に書いた人の名は 言ったの？

translation.en: No, because I'm trying this new thing where I don't talk about people behind their backs.
translation.ja: いえ　もう人の陰口は 言いたくないから

translation.en: That's all right. Getting hit by a bus is pretty good punishment.
translation.ja: バスに ひかれるもんな

translation.en: Ninety-four.
Welcome back, nerd.
Anyway, I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 先生　本当にごめんなさい

translation.en: I forgive you.
But as my own personal form of punishment, I figured out how you're gonna earn that extra credit.
translation.ja: でも私流のやり方で あなたに罰を科すつもり

translation.en: What's up?
Excellent. Great turnout this year.
translation.ja: すげえ　今年は大入りだ

translation.en: -All right. It's all you. -Okay. -Make me look good out there. -Okay.
translation.ja: 頼んだわよ 私の評判を上げて

translation.en: Marymount, you sons of bitches. You no-good sons of bitches.
translation.ja: メアリーマウント高め クソ食らえ

translation.en: You nervous?
Don't be. You can do this. There's nothing to break your focus,
translation.ja: 大丈夫 気が散る心配はないわ

translation.en: because not one of those Marymount boys is cute.
[host] Good evening, ladies and gentlemen. Welcome to the Illinois High School Mathletes State Championship.
translation.ja: イリノイ州マスリート王 決勝戦にようこそ

translation.en: Let's start the competition. Here is the first question.
translation.ja: では始めましょう　第１問

translation.en: Twice the larger of two numbers is three more than five times
translation.ja: “２Ｘの値は５Ｙプラス３に 等しく―”

translation.en: the smaller, and the sum of four times the larger and three times the smaller is 71.
-What are-- -[buzzer]
translation.ja: “ＸとＹの値は…” ノース･ショア

translation.en: -North Shore? -Fourteen and five.
That is correct. Question number two.
Find an odd three-digit number whose digits add up to 12.
translation.ja: “３ケタの奇数で すべての和が12”

translation.en: The digits are all different, and the difference between the first two digits -equals the difference between-- -[buzzer]
translation.ja: “最初の２ケタの差と 次の２ケタの差が同じ…”

translation.en: Marymount?
-Seven hundred and forty one. -Correct.
[Cady] Shoot. I was really rusty.
Where's Cady?
She went out.
She's grounded.
Are they not allowed out when they're grounded?
translation.ja: 一日中 禁止なのか？

translation.en: Don't forget to vote for Spring Fling King and Queen, people.
translation.ja: パーティー･キングと クイーンの投票を！

translation.en: These A-holes will represent you for a full calendar year.
translation.ja: 次の生徒会長だからね

translation.en: I'm gonna vote for Regina George because she got hit by that bus.
translation.ja: レジーナだ バスに激突したから

translation.en: I'm voting for Cady Heron because she pushed her.
translation.ja: その立役者のケイディ

translation.en: She's supposed to be grounded, but he let her out.
translation.ja: 娘は外出禁止なのに 夫が許可を

translation.en: After 87 minutes of very competitive play, we have a tie.
translation.ja: 87分間の熱戦を終え 現在 同点です

translation.en: In the event of a tie, we move into a sudden-death round.
translation.ja: これからサドンデスに 入ります

translation.en: Each team is given the opportunity to choose their opponent.
translation.ja: 両チーム 対戦相手を 選んでください

translation.en: North Shore, who do you select?
The girl, dude. The girl.
Contestant Krafft.
[host] From Marymount, Miss Caroline Krafft.
translation.ja: キャロライン･クラフト選手

translation.en: We pick the girl, too.
And from North Shore, Miss Caddy Heron.
translation.ja: キャディ･ハーロン選手

translation.en: It's Cady.
Oh, my God, that's me.
[Cady] Miss Caroline Krafft seriously needed to pluck her eyebrows.
translation.ja: 少しは眉毛の 手入れしたら？

translation.en: Her outfit looked like it was picked out by a blind Sunday school teacher.
translation.ja: 制服の着こなしも センス悪すぎ

translation.en: And she had some 99-cent lip gloss on her snaggletooth.
translation.ja: 歯並びも悪いし リップも安物

translation.en: And that's when I realized, making fun of Caroline Krafft wouldn't stop her from beating me in this contest.
translation.ja: いくら彼女をけなしても 勝負に勝てるわけじゃない

translation.en: Contestants, find the limit of this equation.
translation.ja: 問題です この方程式の極限は？

translation.en: Calling somebody else fat won't make you any skinnier.
translation.ja: 誰かをデブと言っても

translation.en: Calling someone stupid doesn't make you any smarter.
translation.ja: 自分がヤセるわけじゃない

translation.en: And ruining Regina George's life definitely didn't make me any happier.
translation.ja: レジーナを陥れて 私に何の得が？

translation.en: All you can do in life is try to solve the problem in front of you.
translation.ja: 私は自分の問題に 集中するだけ

translation.en: The limit is negative one.
[Cady] Oh, crap. I lost.
-That answer is incorrect. -[teammates groan]
Now, we are in a sudden death. If Miss Heron can answer
translation.ja: サドンデスなので ハーロン選手が正解すれば―

translation.en: this problem correctly, we have a winner.
translation.ja: サドンデスなので ハーロン選手が正解すれば― 勝者決定です

translation.en: [Cady] Limits. Why couldn't I remember anything about limits?
translation.ja: 極限を習ったのは いつだっけ？

translation.en: Limits. That was the week Aaron got his hair cut.
translation.ja: アーロンが髪を切った日だ

translation.en: Oh, God, he looked so cute. Okay, focus, Cady.
translation.ja: カワイかった… じゃなくて―

translation.en: What was on the board behind Aaron's head?
If the limit never approaches anything...
translation.ja: 確か無限に 伸びてなかった？

translation.en: The limit does not exist.
The limit does not exist!
translation.ja: 極限は ありません

translation.en: Our new state champions, the North Shore Mathletes.
translation.ja: 今年のマスリート王は ノース･ショア高校！

translation.en: How do you like me now?
You like that? Yeah! Get some! Get some!
translation.ja: ほんの実力だ おととい来やがれ！

translation.en: [boy] Awesome. You went with the leather sleeves.
Africa, you did the damn thing.
Aw, thanks, K.G.
We're gonna look so kick-ass in these when we roll into Spring Fling.
translation.ja: きっとパーティーで目立つ

translation.en: -Oh, no, I'm not going. -What?
Cady, this is your night. Don't let the haters stop you from doing your thang.
translation.ja: 今夜の主役は お前だ そりゃないべ

translation.en: Did you just say "thang"?
Cady, you don't have to punish yourself forever.
But I'm grounded.
You're already out.
All right, do we have all of our nominees for king and queen on the stage?
translation.ja: 候補者はステージに そろってるかな？

translation.en: Okay, good.
I just wanted to say that you're all winners.
translation.ja: だが主役は ここにいる全員だ

translation.en: And I could not be happier that this school year's ending.
translation.ja: 無事に１年を 終えられて うれしいよ

translation.en: Here we go. The winner of the Spring Fling King,
translation.ja: 進めよう 本年度のパーティー･ キングに選ばれたのは―

translation.en: Shane Oman.
Whoo! That's what I'm talking about!
[Mr. Duvall] And your Spring Fling Queen,
future co-chair of the Student Activities Board
translation.ja: 来年度の生徒会長を 務めてもらう

translation.en: and winner of two gift certificates to the Walker Brothers Pancake House,
translation.ja: 賞品はパンケーキのギフト券だ クイーンは―

translation.en: Cady Heron.
Where is Cady?
There she is.
Wow.
translation.ja: ありがとうございます

translation.en: Well, half the people in this room are mad at me.
translation.ja: 私が皆に嫌われてることは 分かってる

translation.en: And the other half only like me
translation.ja: 私が皆に嫌われてることは 分かってる 好きだとしても それは誰かさんに―

translation.en: because they think I pushed somebody in front of a bus.
translation.ja: 好きだとしても それは誰かさんに―

translation.en: So, that's not good.
You know, it's not really required of you to make a speech.
translation.ja: スピーチは必要ないんだ

translation.en: I'm almost done, I swear.
To, uh, all the people whose feelings that got hurt by the Burn Book,
translation.ja: “悪口ノート”の件で 傷ついた人全員に言います

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
You know, I've never been to one of these things before.
translation.ja: 今夜 私に与えられた名誉を―

translation.en: And when I think about how many people wanted this,
translation.ja: 大勢の女の子が 望んでいたと思う

translation.en: and how many people cried over it and stuff...
translation.ja: 何人が ガッカリしたか

translation.en: I mean, I think everybody looks like royalty tonight.
translation.ja: でも私には全員が クイーンに見えます

translation.en: Look at Jessica Lopez. That dress is amazing.
translation.ja: ジェシカのドレス とってもすてき

translation.en: And Emma Gerber, I mean, that hairdo must have taken hours, and you look really pretty.
translation.ja: エマの髪形も凝ってて すごく可愛いわ

translation.en: So... why is everybody stressing over this thing?
translation.ja: こんな物のために 悩むのは間違ってる

translation.en: I mean, it's just plastic. Could really just...
translation.ja: ただのプラスチック なんだから―

translation.en: ...share it.
A piece for Gretchen Wieners, a partial Spring Fling Queen.
translation.ja: クイーンの王冠の一部を グレチェンに

translation.en: A piece for Janis Ian.
Seriously, most people just take the crown and go.
translation.ja: だからスピーチは 必要ないと…

translation.en: And a piece for Regina George. She fractured her spine, and she still looks like a rock star.
translation.ja: 背骨を折っても輝いてる レジーナにも一部を

translation.en: And some for everybody else.
God, Mr. Duvall, can you wrap it up?
All right, have a good time, everyone.
Look. I'm a queen.
As am I.
So, are we still in a fight?
Are you still an asshole?
Mmm, I don't think so.
Well, then I guess we're okay.
Oh, my God, I love this song!
I hate this song.
I know this song!
Um, man candy, stage right.
Hey, what's up?
Hey. Didn't think you'd make it.
Oh, um, on behalf of the senior class, I would like to present you with two gift certificates--
translation.ja: 生徒会を代表して 賞品のギフト券を２枚…

translation.en: -Thanks, sucker. -Yo, peace.
One gift certificate to the Walker Brothers Pancake House.
translation.ja: ギフト券を１枚 進呈します

translation.en: Congratulations on winning State.
I was so nervous. They made us do limits. I thought I was gonna hurl.
translation.ja: 緊張しすぎて 吐くかと思った

translation.en: How's your stomach now?
It's fine.
Do you feel nauseous at all?
-Have you been drinking? -No.
Okay.
Grool.
What's up?
Can I help you?
You Puerto Rican?
Lebanese.
I feel that.
[Cady] In case you're wondering, The Plastics broke up.
translation.ja: プラスチックスは解散した

translation.en: Regina's spine healed, and her physical therapist taught her to channel all her rage into sports.
translation.ja: レジーナは医者の助言で スポーツで怒りの発散を

translation.en: [Cady] It was perfect, because the jock girls weren't afraid of her.
Karen used her special talents to do the morning weather announcements.
translation.ja: カレンは天気予報で 特技を発揮

translation.en: Hi. This is Karen Smith. It's 68 degrees,
translation.ja: カレン･スミスです 気温は20度

translation.en: and there's a 30% chance that it's already raining.
translation.ja: 雨が降ってる確率は30％です

translation.en: [Cady] And Gretchen found herself a new clique and a new queen bee to serve.
translation.ja: グレチェンは 別の女王に仕えてる

translation.en: [Cady] Aaron went to Northwestern, so I still get to see him on weekends.
translation.ja: アーロンは大学に進学 週末は私とデート

translation.en: And me? I had gone from home-schooled jungle freak, to shiny Plastic,
translation.ja: 私はジャングル娘と お人形さんを卒業し―

translation.en: to most hated person in the world, to actual human being.
translation.ja: やっと普通の人間に たどり着けた

translation.en: All the drama from last year just wasn't important anymore.
School used to be like a shark tank, but now I could just float.
translation.ja: サメの水槽に思えた学校が 今は心地いい

translation.en: Finally, Girl World was at peace.
translation.ja: 女の子の世界に平和が訪れた

translation.en: Hey, check it out. Junior Plastics.
translation.ja: 見てみなよ　新しい プラスチックスの誕生だ

translation.en: [Cady] And if any freshmen tried to disturb that peace...
translation.ja: この平和を破る子がいたら―

translation.en: Well, let's just say we knew how to take care of it.
translation.ja: 効果抜群のアレで 退治してやる

translation.en: Just kidding.
